## ä»£ç å—

ä»£ç å—æ”¯æŒ 168 ç§ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€

```javascript
// javascript å†’æ³¡æ’åº
function bubbleSort(array) {
  let swapped = true;
  do {
    swapped = false;
    for (let j = 0; j < array.length; j++) {
      if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) {
        let temp = array[j];
        array[j] = array[j + 1];
        array[j + 1] = temp;
        swapped = true;
      }
    }
  } while (swapped);
  return array;
}
```
